short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When doing code reviews it's handy to see on which files you've made comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the number of comments that have been made on files when viewing the pull request file list.  This is especially helpful if you are conducting a large code review and have hidden many files but need to find a comment you made earlier; this helps you easily spot the files with comments.
